name: Stray Gods - Ultimate Setlist Bundle
description:
This is a bundle with the all four official soundtracks for Stray Gods: The Roleplaying Musical game.

Red Edition: The songs of Stray Gods, when played in an entirely Kickass way!
Green Edition: The songs of Stray Gods, when played in an entirely Charming way!
Blue Edition: The songs of Stray Gods, when played in an entirely Charming way!
Pantheon Edition: This album contains an eclectic sample playthru of each song, mixing the traits to represent one possible way to roleplay Grace. It also contains excerpts from the underscore that bridge the songs in-game.

Music Director: Austin Wintory
Songs co-written by: Austin Wintory, Tripod and Montaigne
